name: Bridge Tunnel Client
description: Connects to a bridge proxy server to intercept outbound traffic via iptables and tunnel it over gRPC.

bridgeServerAddr.description: Address of the bridge proxy server (e.g. k8spf:///pod.ns:9090 or localhost:9090)

appPort.description: Local app port to forward inbound requests to

bridgeVersion.description: Version of bridge CLI to install (e.g., 'v1.0.0' or 'edge')

workspacePath.description: Container workspace folder path â€” pass ${containerWorkspaceFolder} from devcontainer.json

forwardDomains.description: Comma-separated list of domain patterns to intercept and resolve through the tunnel (e.g., '*.vercel.app,example.com')

copyFiles.description: Comma-separated list of absolute file paths to copy from the bridge proxy pod into the devcontainer (e.g., '/etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt,/app/config.json')
